title: Any item can't be selected at the first time in library outline view
description: Any item cannot be selected at the first time in library outline view. This issue occurs when attempting to select any item in the library outline view.
OB: When attempting to select any item in the library outline view for the first time, the item does not get selected or highlighted.
EB: The item should get selected or highlighted when attempting to select it in the library outline view for the first time.
SR:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Add a label in the library file.
2. Open the library outline view.
3. Select the label item in the library outline view.
